name: Daily Glycolic Cleanser
about: What it is:A brightening and conditioning AHA cleanser that exfoliates dull skin and removes buildup caused by pollution and other environmental factors..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Glycolic Acid: Potent AHA that exfoliates, brightens, and evens the look of skin tone...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This cleanser is formulated to improve the look of pores and promote a brighter-, more even-looking complexion. A blend of calendula extract and jojoba oil moisturize the skin while caring for the lipid barrier.
ingredients: -Glycolic Acid: Potent AHA that exfoliates, brightens, and evens the look of skin tone. .-Calendula Extract and Allatonin: Visibly calm and nourish the skin while delivering antioxidant benefits..-Jojoba Seed Oil: Lightweight oil that softens skin and cares for the moisture barrier...Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycolic Acid, Glycerin, Peg-6
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pump cleanser into the palm of your hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought because of the ingredients, this would be an easy to use daily cleanser. Unfortunately, it did not agree with my skin and actually gave me mini breakouts alongside my chin. I would not recommend this product to anyone. I use Glycolic toning pads, and face washes so I was confused when this product did not agree with my skin. I actually went on using this product for about 2 weeks, because I did not believe this was what was breaking me out. After I discontinued use of the product my skin was much better. [I also was not experiencing acne prior to using this product].
